name: SantéMPI
description: SantéMPI is a proven, next-generation, fully featured Master Patient Index/Client Registry (MPI/CR) platform designed to overcome barriers to leveraging person-centered data as a catalyst for transforming health systems. It is an essential national digital health infrastructure component that leverages unique identity to facilitate data consolidation, harmonization, sharing, and building health information exchanges (e.g., OpenHIE) to establish interoperability across multiple software solutions. It’s flexible architecture and online/offline capability also supports large scale registration programs such as COVID-19 vaccination registration, and birth and death updates to a CRVS. SantéMPI fulfills these essential roles by implementing all relevant interoperability specifications and requirements related to Client Registry in the OpenHIE specification, including Client Registry as a service, HL7 FHIR, and widely deployed legacy standards like HL7v2. SantéMPI is a PATH Digital Square MPI “global good”, that helps create and liberate the power of high-fidelity data to maximize return on investment for both existing and future digital health solutions.

SDGs.evidenceText: SantéMPI’s patient matching and unique identity capabilities, provide strategic tools to expand good health and well-being at national scale. They do this by enabling transformational improvements data timeliness, quality, availability of discrete, person centered data, data sharing and interoperability across the continuum of care. Timely, high-fidelity, person-centred data is essential to generating the information needed to effectively plan and manage health systems, optimize allocation of resources and build evidence-based feedback loops to drive a virtuous spiral of continuous improvement.

SantéMPI capability to support implementation of national unique health IDs helps establish gender equity by providing a platform that can be used to create and give women the health system access credentials needed to obtain and benefit from the health care services of they want and need, when and where they need them.

bestPracticesList: SantéSuite software development processes and team follow the Principles for Digital Development, we work side-by-side with the country Ministry of Health frontline workers, digital health experts, management, as well as key implementation partners to foster “ground truth” evidence-based improvement and inspire and drive our innovation strategy. SanteSuite uses a variety of best practices and processes depending on client needs and capacity to participate. For complex projects we follow a Disciplined Agile Delivery Approach which combines the rigor of traditional processes, such as Waterfall and Unified Processes, with the responsiveness of Agile. At a minimum, we leverage Kanban and Scrum (Scrumban) for delivery of smaller projects where our clients do not have the capacity to participate in a full agile delivery. We implement a quality assurance plan after each iteration ensuring that all modules and features work as they are expected. We follow the test-driven development methodology, which ensure that all components or modules are thoroughly tested before they are incorporated into the final solution. Accompanying documentation is provided with each release, including technical documentation and release notes / change logs.

preventHarm.additionalInfoMechanismProcessesPolicies: SantéSuite solutions including SantéMPI all employ a “Privacy by Design” philosophy and software development lifecycle. Protecting privacy is an integral part of implementing a quality assurance plan after each development iteration ensuring that all modules and features work as they are expected. We follow the test-driven development methodology, which ensure that all components or modules are thoroughly tested for privacy compliance before they are incorporated into the final solution.

stepsAddressRiskPreventSafetyUnderageUse: Currently primarily via Slack and Github and limited to technical software developers. SantéSuite does not operate an open online discussion forum.
harassmentProtectionSteps: SanteMPI is a highly technical digital health infrastructure component which would be of interest to a narrow community of technical software developers and implementers who communicate via Slack and Github with our software team. In addition, SantéSuite does not operate an open online discussion forum which also reduces the likelihood of harassment presenting itself as an issue. That being said, we have adopted and implemented a corporate anti-harassment policy, which should the need arise, we would use as a guide to intervene to the degree necessary to cease the harassment.
